title: InterPReT：交互式政策重组和培训使外行能够进行有效的模仿学习
content:
arXiv:2602.04213v1 公告类型：新 
摘要：通过向专家演示学习，模仿学习在许多任务中取得了成功。然而，大多数现有工作依赖于技术专业人员的大规模演示和对培训过程的密切监控。这些都是有挑战性的
original_title: InterPReT: Interactive Policy Restructuring and Training Enable Effective Imitation Learning from Laypersons
original_content:
arXiv:2602.04213v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Imitation learning has shown success in many tasks by learning from expert demonstrations. However, most existing work relies on large-scale demonstrations from technical professionals and close monitoring of the training process. These are challengin

title: 在 Anthropic 放弃自己的代理编码模型几分钟后，OpenAI 就推出了新的代理编码模型
content: 新模型旨在加速 Codex 的功能，Codex 是 OpenAI 本周早些时候推出的代理编码工具。
original_title: OpenAI launches new agentic coding model only minutes after Anthropic drops its own
original_content: The new model is built to accelerate the capabilities of Codex, the agentic coding tool OpenAI launched earlier this week.

title: Anthropic 发布 Opus 4.6，新增“代理团队”
content: Anthropic 模型的最新版本旨在扩大其功能和吸引力，允许更多种类的用途和客户。
original_title: Anthropic releases Opus 4.6 with new ‘agent teams’
original_content: The newest version of Anthropic's model is designed to broaden its capabilities and appeal, allowing for a greater variety of uses and customers.

title: OpenAI 为企业推出了一种构建和管理人工智能代理的方法
content: OpenAI 推出了 Frontier，这是一个新平台，专为企业构建和部署代理而设计，同时将他们视为人类员工。
original_title: OpenAI launches a way for enterprises to build and manage AI agents
original_content: OpenAI launched Frontier, a new platform designed for enterprises to build and deploy agents while treating them like human employees.
